question: Ibadat Khana at Fatehpur Sikri was constructed in which of the following year?
explanation:
In gratitude towards Sufi saint Salim Chishti, Akbar built a magnificent city in Sikri and shifted his capital there.In c.1575 CE, he
constructed the Ibadat Khana (Hall of prayers) at his new capital Fatehpur Sikri wherein Akbar invited learned scholars from all religions.
